title: Andhra Pradesh Irrigation & Livelihood Improvement Project (APILIP-II)
short_desc: Strengthening Water User Associations and improving irrigation-linked livelihoods (JICA funded).
long_desc: APILIP-II focuses on strengthening Water User Associations (WUAs), improving irrigation infrastructure and supporting allied livelihoods through capacity building and technical assistance. Activities include training for farmers across WUAs, institutional strengthening, and promotion of sustainable water use practices.

title: Andhra Pradesh Integrated Irrigation & Agriculture Transformation Project (APIIATP)
short_desc: Support to minor irrigation and WUA strengthening (World Bank funded).
long_desc: APIIATP supports minor irrigation schemes and strengthens local institutions such as WUAs and FPOs. Activities included farmer trainings, establishment of demo plots, and coordination with government line departments.

title: Andhra Pradesh Community Based Tank Management Project (APCBTMP)
short_desc: Minor irrigation tanks development and WUA capacity building.
long_desc: APCBTMP worked on minor irrigation tank development, building WUA capacities in water management, collective agri-business, and agri demonstrations to enhance productivity and sustainability.

title: NABARD Watershed Development Programme
short_desc: Watershed activities to enhance water security and livelihoods in KV Palle Mandal.
long_desc: NABARD-supported watershed interventions focusing on soil & water conservation, livelihood support and community institution strengthening in KV Palle Mandal.

title: Pallejeevam - Andhra Pradesh Drought Mitigation Project (APDMP)
short_desc: Drought mitigation with focus on FPO promotion, CLICs and CHCs.
long_desc: APDMP emphasised community-based drought mitigation, promoting Farmer Producer Organisations (FPOs), establishing Climate Information Centres (CLICs) and Custom Hiring Centres (CHCs) to support smallholder farmers.

title: Mana Vittana Kendramu (MVK) - Seed Production & Banks
short_desc: Local seed production and seed bank establishment to promote seed sovereignty.
long_desc: MVK supports production and storage of breeder seeds, distribution to farmers, and promotes local seed conservation practices to ensure availability of quality seeds.

title: Bio-Resource Centres (Organic Inputs)
short_desc: Production and dissemination of organic inputs like Jeevamrutham and Neemasthram.
long_desc: Bio-resource centres produce organic formulations (Jeevamrutham, Ganajeevamrutham, etc.), provide training on organic practices and support farmers transitioning to sustainable agriculture.

title: Support for Climate-Resilient Cropping Systems
short_desc: Promoting millets and drought-resistant crops.
long_desc: Promotion of climate-resilient cropping patterns, distribution of Navadhanya kits, and support for traditional millet cultivation to reduce water stress and improve resilience.

title: Watershed-Based Activities & APDMP Convergence
short_desc: Integrated watershed interventions linked with APDMP and NABARD.
long_desc: Convergent activities with NABARD and APDMP to strengthen watershed measures, recharge structures and livelihood linkages.

title: Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM) - VWSC Capacity Building
short_desc: Capacity building for Village Water & Sanitation Committees on sustainable WASH.
long_desc: JJM-linked activities focused on capacitating Village Water & Sanitation Committees (VWSCs) and frontline service providers on community management of water supply and sanitation services.
partners: Department of Rural Water Supply & Sanitation, GoAP

title: Groundwater Management & Rainwater Harvesting Training
short_desc: Training communities on groundwater conservation and rainwater harvesting.
long_desc: Community trainings and technical support to adopt rainwater harvesting, groundwater recharge techniques and build local capacity for sustainable water management.

title: Natural Resource Management (NRM) - Living Soils & Learning Sites
short_desc: NRM demonstrations, living soils and learning sites.
long_desc: NRM activities include development of living soils, learning sites, borewell inventories with GIS mapping and demonstrations to improve soil health and moisture retention.

title: Demonstrations on NRM Practices
short_desc: Soil moisture conservation and protective irrigation demonstrations.
long_desc: Field demonstrations showcasing soil moisture conservation techniques, protective irrigation methods and other NRM best practices.

title: Drip Irrigation Implementation
short_desc: Targeted drip irrigation support to farmers for efficient water use.
long_desc: Provision and technical support for drip irrigation systems to optimize water use and improve crop yields on small holdings.

title: Soil Health Improvement Initiatives
short_desc: Soil testing, fertigation, gypsum distribution and organic inputs.
long_desc: Interventions promoting soil testing-based fertilizer use, distribution of gypsum, promotion of fertigation and organic inputs to protect soil health and increase productivity.

title: Promotion of Organic Farming & Biofertilizers
short_desc: Farmer field schools and bio-resource centre activities supporting organic farming.
long_desc: Support for farmers to adopt organic practices via Farmer Field Schools, training on biofertilizer production and access to bio-resource centre products.
locations: KV Palle cluster and Chittoor district

title: Climate Information Centres (CLICs)
short_desc: Local CLIC centres to disseminate climate and agriculture advisories.
long_desc: CLICs provide audiovisual resources, specialist sessions and equipment support to farmer groups, enabling timely dissemination of climate-smart advisories and practices.

title: CHAMAN Project (Horticulture Assessment & Management)
short_desc: Primary horticulture data collection and crop cutting experiments.
long_desc: CHAMAN involved large-scale primary data collection on horticulture crops across villages, and conducting Crop Cutting Experiments (CCEs) to support crop-level planning and research.

title: Baseline Survey of Horticulture - Kolar (Karnataka)
short_desc: Baseline survey and large-scale farmer registration in Kolar district.
long_desc: Comprehensive baseline survey across Hoblis registering hundreds of thousands of horticulture farmers and entering detailed farmer-level data into government portals.

title: Baseline Survey of Horticulture - Chittoor (AP)
short_desc: Baseline survey and farmer registration across Chittoor district.
long_desc: Registered farmer-level horticulture data across all mandals of Chittoor and supported integration with state horticulture portals.

title: Entrepreneurship Skill Development Programmes (ESDPs)
short_desc: Skill development and placement support for rural youth.
long_desc: ESDPs provided vocational skill training in multiple trades to unemployed youth with placement support; nearly two-thirds of trainees found employment post-training.

title: Skill Development for Rural Youth & Women
short_desc: Vocational training, entrepreneurship and placement support.
long_desc: A range of skill development interventions targeted at rural youth and women to enhance employability and local entrepreneurship through training, mentorship and market linkages.

title: Women Empowerment in FPOs
short_desc: Promoting women's participation and leadership in FPOs.
long_desc: Interventions to ensure women's representation in FPO executive committees, capacity building specifically for women and support for women-led livelihood enterprises.

title: PREVENT IT - Antibiotic Resistance Awareness
short_desc: Awareness campaigns on prevention of antibiotic resistance (EU & Chitkara University).
long_desc: PREVENT IT delivered empowerment camps and awareness activities across academic and community forums to sensitize stakeholders about antibiotic resistance and prudent antibiotic use.

title: Health & Nutrition Awareness during COVID-19
short_desc: Emergency relief and awareness activities during the pandemic.
long_desc: Distribution of masks, fruits and vegetables and awareness programmes on hand hygiene, sanitation and nutrition for vulnerable families during the COVID-19 pandemic.
locations: Kalakada; Kalikiri; KV Palli; Chinnagottigalu Mandals

title: Community-Based Training for ANMs, ASHAs & Anganwadi Workers
short_desc: Training frontline health workers on sanitation, WASH and community hygiene.
long_desc: Capacity building sessions for government frontline workers (ANMs, ASHAs, Anganwadi) to strengthen local WASH services and community health outreach.

title: Veterinary Support to POP Families
short_desc: Support for poultry and small ruminant rearers including local breed promotion.
long_desc: Provision of veterinary services, vaccination drives, support for local breed poultry entrepreneurs and distribution of subsidised cattle feed to improve livelihoods of POP families.

title: Verification of Nirmal Gram Puraskar (NGP) Awards
short_desc: Evaluation and verification for NGP awards in multiple districts.
long_desc: Third-party verification of NGP awards including data collection, field verification and reporting to recommend awards.

title: Study for Monitoring & Documentation of MGNREGS
short_desc: Monitoring MGNREGS convergence initiatives in Chittoor and YSR Kadapa.
long_desc: A study focusing on convergence of MGNREGS initiatives, involving secondary data collection, beneficiaries surveys and physical verification of assets.

title: Third Party Monitoring on AP Electoral Rolls
short_desc: Verification and monitoring of electoral rolls in AP districts.
long_desc: Field verification and data validation of electoral rolls to support transparent electoral processes.

title: 3rd Party Evaluation under RKVY (Agriculture & Organic Farming)
short_desc: Third-party evaluation of RKVY initiatives in several districts.
long_desc: Field surveys and interviews assessing implementation of RKVY-funded agriculture and organic farming initiatives, followed by reporting and recommendations.

title: Process Monitoring of APDPIP & APRPRP (Velugu Project)
short_desc: Process monitoring of poverty eradication programmes across multiple districts.
long_desc: Monitoring and reporting on programme delivery, trainings for community coordinators and use of participatory rural appraisal tools to assess outcomes.

title: CHAMAN Project (Horticulture Assessment & Management)
short_desc: Primary horticulture data collection and crop cutting experiments.
long_desc: CHAMAN involved large-scale primary data collection on horticulture crops across villages, and conducting Crop Cutting Experiments (CCEs) to support crop-level planning and research.

title: Women Empowerment in FPOs
short_desc: Promoting women's participation and leadership in FPOs.
long_desc: Interventions to ensure women's representation in FPO executive committees, capacity building specifically for women and support for women-led livelihood enterprises.

short_desc: Drought mitigation with focus on FPO promotion, CLICs and CHCs.
long_desc: APDMP emphasised community-based drought mitigation, promoting Farmer Producer Organisations (FPOs), establishing Climate Information Centres (CLICs) and Custom Hiring Centres (CHCs) to support smallholder farmers.

short_desc: Watershed activities to enhance water security and livelihoods in KV Palle Mandal.
long_desc: NABARD-supported watershed interventions focusing on soil & water conservation, livelihood support and community institution strengthening in KV Palle Mandal.

short_desc: NRM demonstrations, living soils and learning sites.
long_desc: NRM activities include development of living soils, learning sites, borewell inventories with GIS mapping and demonstrations to improve soil health and moisture retention.

long_desc: CLICs provide audiovisual resources, specialist sessions and equipment support to farmer groups, enabling timely dissemination of climate-smart advisories and practices.

long_desc: CHAMAN involved large-scale primary data collection on horticulture crops across villages, and conducting Crop Cutting Experiments (CCEs) to support crop-level planning and research.

long_desc: Registered farmer-level horticulture data across all mandals of Chittoor and supported integration with state horticulture portals.
